actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to eliminate restrictions on the use of funds appropriated to the Law Enforcement Assistance Agency for the carrying out of the provisions of the Public Safety Officers' Benefits Act of 1976.

summary.text: Repeals the provision in the Public Safety Officers' Benefits Act of 1976 limiting the authority to make benefit payments under such Act to the extent provided for in advance by appropriation Acts.

titles.title: A bill to eliminate restrictions on the use of funds appropriated to the Law Enforcement Assistance Agency for the carrying out of the provisions of the Public Safety Officers' Benefits Act of 1976.
